channel.title: harajuku on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in harajuku on Barefoot Rob

item.title: candy showtime
item.description: 13:16 Sunday 13 August 2017 JST After the workout, Lin and Ma showed me Candy Show Time(?) a shop where they convert sugar, flavor, and food coloring into long noodles before cutting the noodles into candy sized pieces. It’s pretty ingenious, to be honest. $700 for a custom order. Hmmmm. Maybe Dogecoin or another crypto coin would be a unique design they hadn’t done before.

item.title: harajuku
item.description: ##18:18 Friday 27 March 2015 JST## I just walked through Harajuku, along Yoyogi Park, then through the web of streets near Center Street (which has been renamed, but to what, I’ve forgotten), across Shibuya Scramble and am now on Yamanote Line headed home. One shop piqued my interest (besides the place where I sometimes get chicken-pita sandwiches): My Free Bit, I think it was called. Android phones and branding of light blue on white background.
